questions: How motivated are you to engage in your work/studies?
Satisfaction with my motivation and drive
How engaged do you feel during work/study activities?
Level of focus and immersion in tasks
How satisfied are you with your progress and achievements?
Feeling of accomplishment and growth
How satisfied are you with your work/study environment?
Physical and social work/study setting
How satisfied are you with your work-study-life balance?
Balance between responsibilities and personal life
How meaningful do you find your work/studies?
Sense of purpose and value in activities
How supported do you feel in your work/study environment?
Availability of support from colleagues/supervisors
How clear are your goals and expectations?
Understanding of what's expected and where you're headed
How much autonomy do you have in your work/studies?
Freedom to make decisions and control your approach
How likely are you to recommend your work/study situation to others?
Overall satisfaction and endorsement
